name: BALL PIT KING 3D
description:
Drop, stack and merge 3D balls with hilarious faces to create bigger ones and score points. Your goal? Create the gigantic King Ball and rule supreme over the Ball Pit!

  • Two balls of the same type will merge and create a bigger royal subject. Different types will not combine so be smart about placing the balls or risk being denied passage to the lower levels of the Pit.

  • How high can you stack the loyal balls? Can you beat your last score? Pick the right spots for the three balls of varying sizes at your disposal and use the responsive 3D physics to your advantage.

  • But take care stacking the loyal balls because if they fall out of the Ball Pit, it's Game Over. A King doesn't leave anyone behind!

  • Friendly Royal Duels: Challenge your friends by taking a look at the included Scoreboard and try to beat their Highscores.

Ball-ieve in yourself: With enough perserverance, strategy and finesse you can create the ultimate King Ball and claim the title of BALL PIT KING!
